New Records: David Warner top-scored with 70 off 36 deliveries in his 100th T20 International
Key Match Events: Brandon King and Johnson Charles' high-octane opening stand of 89 off 51 balls
West Indies lost wickets and momentum after the opening stand
Tim David counter-punched with a 17-ball unbeaten 37
Post-Match Reflections: Captain Rovman Powell commented on the game saying, 'In the middle we struggled to get a partnership but it was still a good game of cricket. We’ve just got to back ourselves a little bit more'
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies' chase stuttered after the opening stand
Holder flexed his shoulders to clobber three fours and two sixes in a 44-run, unbroken ninth wicket partnership with Akeal Hosein
